text: Now the module structure for the rest of the modules will be focusing on One learning video. There will be three replay drills. There will be a Q&A session on Strategies we look at we look at four strategies and then there's that one live exercise worksheet that we provide for you To to trade in the live markets in order to consolidate your learning the opposite the optimum market environment for these Markets as you can see it's colored in you know elements of red and and light red and orange so not the the green colors with high volume high velocity generally these patterns exist in lower liquidity environments lower volume and lower velocity not much velocity going order book a little the order book a little bit thinner and less liquid so so there is there is one predominantly main player on the order book at that time. It usually exists not in the expansive state of the market, it usually exists in a very compressed state of the market and that is really the ideal market environment for those types of price ladder patterns to exist.
